snippet: Natalie Spooner broke a tie on a 5-on-3 power play with 3:30 left, and Canada beat the United States, 4-2, in the Four Nations Cup women’s hockey tournament in Lake Placid, N.Y.
abstract: Canada defeats United States, 4-2, in Four Nations Cup women’s hockey tournament.
lead_paragraph: Natalie Spooner broke a tie on a 5-on-3 power play with 3:30 left, and Canada beat the United States, 4-2, in the Four Nations Cup women’s hockey tournament in Lake Placid, N.Y.

headline.main: Canada Women Top U.S. in Four Nations Cup Tournament
